front.title: New weighted resource record for traffic scheduling

abstract.t: Scheduling traffic in proportion to different nodes can optimize bandwidth utilization and improve user experience when the Internet traffic exceeds the bandwidth limit of a CDN cache node. This document defines AX and AAAAX RR types by adding weight field to existing A and AAAA resource records. A group of weighted records will be sorted in the DNS response according to the weight in AX and AAAAX records.
